testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want a page where I can view multi-class students and perform actions like adding or removing students from multi-class.
testcase.name: TIn the window of the selected student for the update, by clicking the "remove" button, a class should be removed for that student.
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user clicks on the admin login tab.................................passed And The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser..............passed And The user enters "adminUsername_dgn" into the username textbox...........passed And The user enters "password_dgn" into the password textbox................passed When The user clicks the Sign In button and goes to the admin page..........passed And The user clicks on the Student Information link in the admin panel's sidebar.passed And The user clicks on the Multi Class Student link in the opened dropdown menu.passed Then The user verifies that the Class and Section textboxes are visible on the opened page.passed And The user clicks on the Class textbox and selects the Class 2 tab from the opened dropdown menu.passed And The user clicks on the Section textbox and selects the A tab from the opened dropdown menu.passed When The user clicks Search button in Multi Class Student page..............passed And The user clicks on the ""+"" icon in the student's window in the top-left corner.undefined Then The user verifies that a new section has been added....................skipped When The user enters different class information in ""Class"" and ""Section"" constructors.skipped And The user clicks ""Update""" button......................................skipped Then The user verifies that the class was added successfully................skipped And User closes the page....................................................skipped
